articles.title: Anju Bobby George wins World Athletics’ Woman of Year Award - The Indian Express
articles.description: "In 2016, Anju opened a training academy for young girls, which has already helped to produce a world U20 medallist. A constant voice for gender equality, she also mentors schoolgirls for future leadership positions within the sport."
articles.content: Indian athlete Anju Bobby George on Thursday said that she was ‘humbled’ and ‘honoured’ to win the Woman of the Year Award by World Athletics for grooming talent and encouraging young girls in India … [+2230 chars]
